-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | QuasiQuoter for Ruby-style multi-line interpolated strings.
--   
--   QuasiQuoter for Ruby-style multi-line interpolated strings.
@package interpolatedstring-qq
@version 0.2


-- | QuasiQuoter for interpolated strings using Ruby syntax. Expressions
--   inside #{} will have <a>show</a> called. Multi-line strings are
--   supported. Escaping of '#' and '{' is done with backslash.
--   
--   <pre>
--   v :: String
--   v = [$istr| well #{"hello" ++ " there"} #{6*7}]
--   </pre>
--   
--   v will have the value " well hello there 42"
module Text.InterpolatedString.QQ

-- | QuasiQuoter for interpolating Haskell values into a string literal.
--   The pattern portion is undefined.
istr :: QuasiQuoter
instance Show StringPart
